description: A cluster level logical grouping of policy rules that can be referenced as a unit by a RoleBinding or ClusterRoleBinding resource.

aggregationRule.description: A field that describes how to build the `rules` for this ClusterRole. If `aggregationRule` is set, then the `rules` are controller managed and direct changes to `rules` will be stomped by the controller.

apiVersion.description: The version of the schema for the object representation

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource

rules.description: All the policy rules for this ClusterRole
